title: Revealing Unprecedented Cathode Interface Behavior in All-Solid-State Batteries with Oxychloride Solid Electrolytes
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE00750F, Paper
Feipeng Zhao, Shumin Zhang, Shuo Wang, Carmen M. Andrei, Hui Yuan, Jigang Zhou, Jian Wang, Zengqing Zhuo, Yu Zhong, Han Su, Jung Tae Kim, Ruizhi Yu, Yingjie Gao, Jinghua Guo, Tsun-Kong Sham, Yifei Mo, Xueliang Sun
All-solid-state lithium batteries (ASSLBs) are highly desirable for their sustainability, enhanced safety, and increased energy densities. The compatibility between cathodes and solid electrolytes (SEs) is critical for ASSLB electrochemical performance....
